Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at ibis Styles Berlin an der Oper places you in the heart of Berlin, minutes from Deutsche Oper Berlin and close to Reichstag Building. This hotel is within close proximity of Technical University and The Story of Berlin.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 55 guestrooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as bicycles to rent, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional features include tour/ticket assistance and discounted use of a nearby fitness facility.

Dining
You can find a meal at a coffee shop/café serving guests of ibis Styles Berlin an der Oper, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 1 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Berlin? This hotel has facilities measuring 646 square feet (60 square meters), including a meeting room.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
You can find a meal at a coffee shop/café serving guests of ibis Styles Berlin an der Oper, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 1 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Deutsche Oper Berlin - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Technical University - 1 km / 0.6 mi
The Story of Berlin - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Theatre of the West - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Schloss Charlottenburg - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Kaethe Kollwitz Museum - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Berlin Zoo - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Schaubuehne - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Europa Center - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Meilenwerk Car Museum - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Grips-Theater - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
KaDeWe - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
ICC Berlin - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Berliner Funkturm - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 19.3 km / 12 mi

The preferred airport for ibis Styles Berlin an der Oper is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
